detail_desc: Wide waist belt in imitation leather with elastic and a metal buckle at the back. Two small bags at the front, connected with a metal chain. One bag has a flap and press-stud and the other is round with a zip. Width of belt 9 cm.
Imitation leather belt with two rows of metal eyelets and a metal buckle. Width 3.5 cm.
Wide waist belt in shiny, snakeskin-patterned imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width approx. 6 cm.
Extra-long waist belt in imitation suede with a metal buckle. The belt can be worn with a simple knot to take your outfit to the next level. Width 2.8 cm.
Wide waist belt in imitation leather with elastic and a metal fastener at the back. Double layered with a narrower strap in imitation suede that is knotted at the front. Width 4 cm.
Wide waist belt in imitation leather with elastic and a metal fastener at the back. Double layered with a narrower strap in imitation suede that is knotted at the front. Width 4 cm.
Waist belt in imitation leather with a wide metal chain at the front and elastic at the back with a metal hook fastening. Width 5 cm.
Jersey top with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, and short puff sleeves.
Jersey top with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, and short puff sleeves.
Jersey top with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, and short puff sleeves.
Long-sleeved nursing top in a soft viscose weave with a boat neck and practical inner top for easier nursing access.
Long-sleeved nursing top in a soft viscose weave with a boat neck and practical inner top for easier nursing access.
Shaping briefs in jersey with an extra-high waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back. The briefs have a firm sculpting effect on the tummy.
Shaping briefs in jersey with an extra-high waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back. The briefs have a firm sculpting effect on the tummy.

Padded jacket in cotton corduroy with a stand-up collar and detachable, faux shearling-lined hood with decorative ears on top. Zip with a chin guard and wind flap with a hook and loop fastening down the front. Diagonal fake front pockets and long sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs. Partly lined in fleece. Recycled polyester lining and filling.
Trainers in imitation suede and imitation leather with a lightly padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and metal details at the sides. Linings and insoles in recycled polyester.
Ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric. Extra-high waist with a wide waist panel and raw-edge hems.

Shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Calf-length coat in a quilted weave with a ribbed stand-up collar and press-studs down the front. Discreet pockets in the side seams, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Lined.

Lightweight popover jacket in a recycled polyamide weave. Mesh-lined drawstring hood, zip and wind flap at the top, a patch front pocket with a flap and hook and loop fastening, covered elastication at the cuffs and a drawstring at the hem. Unlined.
Metal hoop earrings in various designs, two pairs decorated with plastic beads and three pairs decorated with rhinestones.
Jumper in a soft cable knit containing some wool with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Metal studs in various sizes and designs decorated with glass rhinestones.
Set with metal earrings and ear cuffs in various designs. Five pairs of earrings that can be worn separately or together. Two ear cuffs.
Set with metal earrings and ear cuffs in various sizes and designs. Four pairs of earrings that can be worn separately or together. Three ear cuffs.
Metal chain necklaces in various lengths and designs, one with a round pendant decorated with glass beads. Adjustable length.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit viscose with a frill-trimmed collar in a cotton weave and long sleeves.

Oversized zip-through hoodie in sweatshirt fabric with a lined, drawstring hood and zip down the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the hoodie is partly recycled.
Fitted, smocked top in soft cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and a small, overlocked frill trim at the top and hem.
Fitted, smocked top in soft cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and a small, overlocked frill trim at the top and hem.

Long-sleeved top in ribbed jersey with a round neckline and draped front with a wrapover hem.

Narrow, 2-part Alice band in metal decorated with rhinestones and plastic beads.
Padded Alice band covered with rhinestones and plastic beads.
Long-sleeved jumper in a fine-knit modal and cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved jumper in a fine-knit modal and cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Push-up bra in lace with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a wide hem.
Push-up bra in lace with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a wide hem.

Ankle boots in imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Linings in a cotton weave and insoles in imitation leather. Heel 8 cm.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with a zip in one side and covered wedge heels. Linings in satin made from recycled polyester and insoles in imitation leather. Heel 9 cm.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Windbreaker in water-repellent functional fabric with a reflective print. Detachable, mesh-lined hood, stand-up collar and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Zipped front pockets, elastication at the cuffs, an elastic drawstring at the hem with a cord lock at the sides and a tab with a press-stud for easy fastening. Lining made from recycled polyester. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Jumper in a soft wool knit with a ribbed polo neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The cashmere content of the jumper is recycled. The wool content is partly recycled.

Jumper in a soft wool knit with a ribbed polo neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The cashmere content of the jumper is recycled. The wool content is partly recycled.
Boxy-style jumper in a soft wool knit containing some recycled cashmere with a ribbed polo neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Boxy-style jumper in a soft wool knit containing some recycled cashmere with a ribbed polo neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Boxy-style jumper in a soft wool knit containing some recycled cashmere with a ribbed polo neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Short, straight-cut dress in woven fabric with a small collar, V-shaped opening and buttons at the top and a gathered yoke at the back. Gathers at the shoulders, long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Unlined.

Calf-length dress in a viscose crêpe weave with a narrow, frilled collar and V-neck opening with ties at the front. Long, wide raglan sleeves with covered elastication and a narrow frill trim at the cuffs, and a tiered skirt for added width. Unlined.
Short, fitted top with a small stand-up collar and long sleeves.
Short, fitted top with a small stand-up collar and long sleeves.
Cropped top in heavy jersey with a square neckline and long puff sleeves.
Cropped top in heavy jersey with a square neckline and long puff sleeves.

Short, sleeveless dress in textured jersey with a V-neck and narrow, tie-top shoulder straps. Skirt with gathered tiers for added width.

Hipster briefs in soft jersey made from an organic cotton blend with lace trims at the back. Mid waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Hipster briefs in soft jersey made from an organic cotton blend with lace trims at the back. Mid waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.

Straight-cut shirt in soft flannel with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, flap chest pockets with a button, and a rounded hem.

Jumper in a soft, rib-knit wool blend with a V-neck front and back. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Jumper in a soft, rib-knit wool blend with a V-neck front and back. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Calf-length culottes in a linen and cotton weave. Regular waist with covered elastication at the back, side pockets, fake back pockets and wide, straight legs.
Calf-length culottes in a linen and cotton weave. Regular waist with covered elastication at the back, side pockets, fake back pockets and wide, straight legs.

Straight-cut, flutter-sleeved blouse in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar, V-shaped opening with a concealed button at the front and smocked section at the shoulders. Lined. The polyester content of the blouse is partly recycled.
Full-length trousers in airy linen. Regular waist with covered elastication and a drawstring, diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets and wide, straight legs.
Full-length trousers in airy linen. Regular waist with covered elastication and a drawstring, diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets and wide, straight legs.

Knee-length, cold shoulder dress in patterned, crinkled chiffon with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and two flounces at the top that continue over the arms. Gathered seam at the waist with narrow elastication and an airy, softly draping skirt with a seam and flounce at the hem. Lined.

Shirt jacket in cotton twill with a soft brushed finish. Collar, press-studs down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets, long sleeves, cuffs with a press-stud, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
